Other Information

Category (Hangar)

Medium

Manufacturer

Airbus

The A310-200 is the first A310 that was produced.

Trivia

  • The initial design for the A310 series was a smaller variant of the A300, called the A300B100.
  • The first A310-200 is the 162nd Airbus aircraft that was ever created.
  • The in-game image is actually the A300B4-600R, due to there not being one made by Norebbo.
